SEARCH
Package org.opensearch.sdk.rest

Class BaseExtensionRestHandler.ExtensionDeprecationRestHandler

java.lang.Object
org.opensearch.sdk.rest.BaseExtensionRestHandler.ExtensionDeprecationRestHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExtensionRestHandler
Enclosing class:
BaseExtensionRestHandler
public static class BaseExtensionRestHandler.ExtensionDeprecationRestHandler extends Object implements ExtensionRestHandler
ExtensionDeprecationRestHandler provides a proxy for any existing ExtensionRestHandler so that usage of the handler can be logged using the DeprecationLogger.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ExtensionDeprecationRestHandler(ExtensionRestHandler handler, String deprecationMessage, org.opensearch.common.logging.DeprecationLogger deprecationLogger)
    Create a DeprecationRestHandler that encapsulates the handler using the deprecationLogger to log deprecation warning.

  • Constructor Details

    • ExtensionDeprecationRestHandler

      public ExtensionDeprecationRestHandler(ExtensionRestHandler handler, String deprecationMessage, org.opensearch.common.logging.DeprecationLogger deprecationLogger)
      Create a DeprecationRestHandler that encapsulates the handler using the deprecationLogger to log deprecation warning.
      Parameters:
      handler - The rest handler to deprecate (it's possible that the handler is reused with a different name!)
      deprecationMessage - The message to warn users with when they use the handler
      deprecationLogger - The deprecation logger
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any parameter except deprecationMessage is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if deprecationMessage is not a valid header

  • Method Details

    • handleRequest

      public org.opensearch.extensions.rest.ExtensionRestResponse handleRequest(org.opensearch.rest.RestRequest restRequest)
      Handles REST Requests forwarded from OpenSearch for a configured route on an extension. Parameter contains components of the RestRequest received from a user. This method corresponds to the BaseRestHandler.prepareRequest(org.opensearch.rest.RestRequest, org.opensearch.client.node.NodeClient) method.

      Usage is logged via the DeprecationLogger so that the actual response can be notified of deprecation as well.

      Specified by:
      handleRequest in interface ExtensionRestHandler
      Parameters:
      restRequest - a REST request object for a request to be forwarded to extensions
      Returns:
      An ExtensionRestResponse to the request.
